verbs.description: The internet [V: was] wondering during the second debate whether there was a hidden message behind the blouse Melania Trump wore to the second presidential debate .
[ARG0: The internet] was [V: wondering] [ARGM-TMP: during the second debate] [ARG1: whether there was a hidden message behind the blouse Melania Trump wore to the second presidential debate] .
The internet was wondering during the second debate whether there [V: was] [ARG1: a hidden message behind the blouse Melania Trump wore to the second presidential debate] .
The internet was wondering during the second debate whether there was a hidden message behind [ARG1: the blouse] [ARG0: Melania Trump] [V: wore] [ARGM-LOC: to the second presidential debate] .
